data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=N7NHjlPMZjwQ7kNvgH6p910&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCIH8qoF_2FKytxKov_ZMZgClo-F8JpQBArycmZ-rvA6g&oe=663E059C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031471_450514160975639_7876978019992583284_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=u0_7pFskhyIQ7kNvgGvjvah&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAmiSIpKKKWcDXu6l4zUfzPG0FDMUaBR_nu85deUEUIfA&oe=663DE58C)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75210396_1168100270905037_6056515960548689783_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ze9D14Bt5i4Q7kNvgH29qNn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBlGGsYUQ4208TibAYL0UFxgoPnQXFhTZ2CAj4WBqanhQ&oe=663DEB24)
Dive into a breathtaking experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982554_1365777981490507_857979718693496025_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9X0kOdWr7FoQ7kNvgFZcYLa&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCS4xJtR0fV65xI1xNnhQj33tjYoj0flYFtBjzppgamhQ&oe=663DF788)
![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=A1qrxSN4aakQ7kNvgHr0XQs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBvdg9Uwjxa3TjvmbYRbA9f3cdMT9yPNca3oyDDFQ3v1w&oe=663E15D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035438_923857099517367_6431578607880239089_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Wzq_t206QQIQ7kNvgF4Fkz7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCUNoh9IRXC7umSpopgZuLMmWNTqUP-2GAb-i9rTnvwgQ&oe=663DE593)

![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tKZApplPWDoQ7kNvgF7gXVP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAEfaQ5Y9Q8USABuI4pG-xipLtMtymjrYEt-LOIH7dq9A&oe=663DF870)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295893_804268758252860_8856952948920548753_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RxJGgZmZyuoQ7kNvgEU3U5r&_nc_oc=Adgvd8N1n1Zq255uYSXfhFAXvo9MTzOldND7v31ceH-kdg3sAuspKSrxHOBs8vcUDyg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfB50gT-TixsbPQ8_qfXjshlN2wfa6onBQ6dlnXegWndWw&oe=663E0DEB)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vubH_92ZMX8Q7kNvgGq3Pny&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfC0_k7JFpWT5MwUN94oVm0Jt2iq1jH_PD24zHDluyTkng&oe=663DF697)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë

![{"height":702,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982658_417699267880520_1132379095717972405_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xcUlEbihaIkQ7kNvgHdhqZM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfBj1C9E6to_Zkt8s1v3S0jHybveVbfPjKOBGhbDMJY7Ow&oe=663DE151)
